-# Copilot Instructions for Advent of Code 2025

**Important:** Do not use GitHub Copilot or any AI assistance to solve Advent of Code puzzles. Solutions must be your own work, in accordance with Advent of Code rules. Copilot may be used for project setup, boilerplate, or non-solution tasks only.
- [ ] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements

- [ ] Scaffold the Project

- [ ] Customize the Project

- [ ] Install Required Extensions

- [ ] Compile the Project

- [ ] Create and Run Task

- [ ] Launch the Project

- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
